mapper.select: SELECT al.id, al.user_id, al.activity_id, al.created_at, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar, a.title as activity_title, LEFT(a.description, 100) as activity_description FROM activity_likes al INNER JOIN users u ON al.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN activities a ON al.activity_id = a.id WHERE al.activity_id = #{activityId} ORDER BY al.created_at DESC
